alert.note: Alert for Fayette; Union; Wayne (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 05 at 6:05AM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF WAYNE, NORTHERN UNION AND EAST CENTRAL FAYETTE COUNTIES IN EAST CENTRAL INDIANA, SHELBY, NORTHERN PREBLE, NORTHERN CHAMPAIGN, LOGAN AND DARKE COUNTIES IN WEST CENTRAL OHIO, NORTHWESTERN DELAWARE COUNTY IN CENTRAL OHIO, NORTHWESTERN MONTGOMERY AND SOUTHERN HARDIN COUNTIES IN WEST CENTRAL OHIO, NORTHERN UNION COUNTY IN CENTRAL OHIO AND MIAMI COUNTIES IN WEST CENTRAL OHIO THROUGH 645 AM EDT... At 605 AM EDT, strong thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 6 miles west of La Rue to near Fountain City, moving southeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph, frequent cloud-to-ground lightning, and very heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Lightning can cause serious injury or death. Visibility will be poor and hydroplaning is possible. Locations impacted include... Richmond, Troy, Sidney, Piqua, Connersville, Bellefontaine, Greenville, Tipp City, Kenton, West Milton, Centerville, Cambridge City, Versailles, Covington, Richwood, Arcanum, St. Paris, Newport, Bradford and Lewisburg. This includes the following Interstates... I-70 in Indiana between mile markers 135 and 156. I-70 in Ohio between mile markers 0 and 17. I-75 in Ohio between mile markers 69 and 101. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a sturdy building. Motorists should slow down and use extra caution. When thunder roars, go indoors! Do not stay in the open or seek shelter under trees when lightning threatens. To report hazardous weather conditions, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.
